data.title: Three Plays of the Argentine: Juan Moreira, Santos Vega, The Witches' Mountain
data.meta_description: Hardcover. First edition. Translated by Jacob S. Fassett. Edited and with an introduction by Edward Hale Bierstadt. Spine label toned with a bit of loss, corners bumped and endleaves lightly foxed, very good and sound. The text is fine. Plays by Silverio Manco, Luis Bayon Herrera, and Julio Sanchez Gardel. Item #550631
data.text:
